Interface ControlEventMapper

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ConfigurationComponent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArrayControlEventMapper

    public interface ControlEventMapper
extends ConfigurationComponent
    An interface for mapper associating custom events with actions

        Makes the mapping

        boolean map(ControlEvent event,
            int id,
            boolean override)
        Makes the mapping
        Parameters:
        event - the control event
        id - the input event id
        override - if true allows to override an existing mapping
